text: Jaffna Kings (formerly Jaffna Stallions) is a professional franchise cricket team that plays in the Lanka Premier League (LPL). They were formed in 2020, and represent Sri Lanka's Northern Province. The team play their home matches at the Mahinda Rajapaksa International Cricket Stadium in the city of Sooriyawewa. Jaffna have won the LPL four times, and are the current champions ahead of the 2025 tournament. ==References== Category:Lanka Premier League teams Category:2020 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Jaffna Kings
